results.name: Triangle read by rows. Let S(k) be the sequence defined by F(0)=0, F(1)=1, F(n-1) + (n+k)*F(n) = F(n+1). E.g. S(0) = 0,1,1,3,10,43,225,1393,9976,81201, ... Then S(0), S(1), S(2), ... are written next to each other, vertically, with the initial term of each on the next row down. The order of the terms in the rows are then reversed.
comment: For this triangle, the algorithm that generates the Bernoulli numbers gives 3/2, then 1/6, 1/24, ... 1/n!
T(n,n) = A001040(n); T(n,k) = A058294(n,k), k = 1..n. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 14 2014
